ui.title: Social & Mental Health Services
ui.subtitle: Immediate access sa non-law-enforcement professional support. Kani nga resources para ni sa imong safety ug care.
ui.takedown_promo: Nagkinahanglan ka bag tabang sa formal takedown request?

intouch.name: InTouch Community Services
intouch.description: Quality mental health services apil na ang counseling, support groups, ug professional training.

dswd.name: Department of Social Welfare and Development (DSWD)
dswd.description: Crisis centers ug 24/7 hotlines para sa victims sa violence ug sa mga anaa sa krisis.

lunas.name: Lunas Collective
lunas.description: Usa ka volunteer-powered care space para sa mga babae ug members/allies sa LGBTQIA+ community nga nakasinati og gender-based violence o naay sexual ug reproductive health concerns.
lunas.note: Specifically for women and LGBTQIA+ community.

bantay_bata.name: Bantay Bata Helpline 163
bantay_bata.description: Motubag sa reports bahin sa child abuse, exploitation, ug neglect, ug mo-connect sa callers sa appropriate agencies.
bantay_bata.note: Specialized for child abuse and exploitation.

ncmh.name: National Center for Mental Health (NCMH) Crisis Line
ncmh.description: 24/7 crisis hotline nga naghatag og mental health support ug intervention services.

tawag_paglaum.name: Tawag Paglaum - Centro Bisaya
tawag_paglaum.description: Usa ka 24-hour call-based mental health helpline nga naghatag og serbisyo sa English ug Filipino.

rapha.name: Rapha Helpline
rapha.description: Usa ka safe world para sa mga bata nga gawasnon sa sexual abuse ug exploitation. Free online mental health support services.
